page.title: 06Bexhill Youth - The Problems
page.content: The facilities for young people are not very good, there isn't even a {swimming pool}open in the town at the moment. Other sports facilities are {fishing and golf.}The only other sports facilities are in schools. The shopping facilities for young people are also poor. The clothes shops are not up-to-date and are expensive compared to surrounding areas. Bexhill does not really cater for young people. It is a small seaside resort where people go for a quiet holiday or to retire. The town consists mostly of residential homes and places of interest are mainly castles and monuments. Most of the teenagers living in Bexhill go to the {Hastings Pier Disco}on a Friday, because there is nothing like that in Bexhill.
